name: Try to Survive!
description:
Try to Survive! - is an endless game where the player have to survive and kill creatures that want to kill him. At the same time, improving skills will affect the style of his game. The goal is to survive as long as possible and reach the best score.

In the forest you can find barrels with fuel, which can help you to kill monsters.


After each wave you can choose skill to upgrade.


Be careful, because monsters can come from anywhere.


After each wave falls AirDrop, which can help you to survive, you have to hurry up, because it can fall anywhere.
